trans-unit.source: Represents a.dll or .exe file that is loaded into a particular process.
trans-unit.target: 表示加载到特定进程中的 .dll 或 .exe 文件。

trans-unit.source: A module is an executable file or a dynamic link library (DLL).
trans-unit.target: 模块是可执行文件或动态链接库 (DLL)。

trans-unit.source: Each process consists of one or more modules.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程由一个或多个模块组成。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to get information about the module.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于获取有关模块的信息。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> class to get and display information about all the modules that are used by the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>类获取和显示有关由 Notepad.exe 应用程序的所有模块的信息。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

trans-unit.source: Gets the memory address where the module was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取加载模块的内存地址。

trans-unit.source: The load address of the module.
trans-unit.target: 模块的加载地址。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.BaseAddress%2A> properties are used to display the module name and the memory address where each module was loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.BaseAddress%2A>属性用于显示模块名称和内存地址加载每个模块的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the memory address for the function that runs when the system loads and runs the module.
trans-unit.target: 获取在系统加载和运行模块时运行的函数的内存地址。

trans-unit.source: The entry point of the module.
trans-unit.target: 模块的入口点。

trans-unit.source: The module's entry point is the location of the function that is called during process startup, thread startup, process shutdown, and thread shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 模块的入口点是函数的在进程启动，线程启动，进程关闭和线程关闭过程中调用的位置。

trans-unit.source: While the entry point is not the address of the DllMain function, it should be close enough for most purposes.
trans-unit.target: 尽管入口点不是 DllMain 函数的地址，它应为大多数情况下足够接近。

trans-unit.source: Due to changes in the way that Windows loads assemblies, <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.EntryPointAddress%2A> will always return 0 on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)] and should not be relied on for those platforms.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Windows 加载程序集的方式更改<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.EntryPointAddress%2A>将始终返回 0 上[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，不应依靠这些平台上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.EntryPointAddress%2A> properties are used to display the name and the entry point address for each module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.EntryPointAddress%2A>属性用于显示的名称和每个模块的入口点地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full path to the module.
trans-unit.target: 获取模块的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path that defines the location of the module.
trans-unit.target: 定义模块位置的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: If the file name is longer than the maximum number of characters allowed, the file name is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件名称的长度超过最大允许的字符数，该文件名称被截断。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.FileName%2A> properties are used to display the module name and the full path information for each module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.FileName%2A>属性用于显示模块名称和每个模块的完整路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets version information about the module.
trans-unit.target: 获取模块的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" /> that contains the module's version information.
trans-unit.target: 包含模块版本信息的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.FileVersionInfo%2A> properties are used to display the module name and the file version information for each module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.FileVersionInfo%2A>属性用于显示模块名称和每个模块的文件版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of memory that is required to load the module.
trans-unit.target: 获取加载模块所需内存量。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the memory that the module occupies.
trans-unit.target: 模块占用的内存大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleMemorySize%2A> does not include any additional memory allocations that the module makes once it is running; it includes only the size of the static code and data in the module file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleMemorySize%2A> 不包括运行; 后，模块将进行任何额外的内存分配它在模块文件中包括仅静态代码和数据的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleMemorySize%2A> properties are used to display the module name and the amount of memory needed for each module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleMemorySize%2A>属性用于显示模块名称和每个模块所需的内存量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the process module.
trans-unit.target: 获取进程模块的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the module.
trans-unit.target: 模块的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the name is longer than the maximum number of characters allowed, it is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称的长度超过最大允许的字符数，则将被截断。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> property is used to display the name of each module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>属性用来显示每个模块的名称。

trans-unit.source: Converts the name of the module to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将模块的名称转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new process for the Notepad.exe application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Notepad.exe 应用程序的新进程。

trans-unit.source: The code iterates through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection> class to obtain a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule> object for each module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此代码循环访问<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection>类来获取<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule>集合中每个模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ToString%2A> method is used to display the name for each module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ToString%2A>方法用于显示每个模块的名称。
